UIcomponents

Class GameFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • UIcomponents.GameFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameSaver

    public class GameFrame
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    GameFrame class, which draws graphics. The main implementation techniques are Buffer strategy and update of game status every second
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • run

        public void run()
        Run method. which calls by method start(), that creates a new thread. While game is running, this method is updating the game status and rendering a new image with new properties
        Specified by:
